item.title: Tuple deconstruction in C# 7
item.description: Last time on this blog I talked about the new tuple feature of C# 7. In Visual Studio 15 Preview 3, the feature wasnâ€™t quite finished; it lacked 2 important aspects: emitting metadata for the names of tuple elements, so that the names are preserved across assemblies deconstruction of tuples into separate variables Well, it looks like the C# language team has been busy during the last month, because both items are now implemented in VS 15 Preview 4, which was released today!
